name: Waverley Communications Limited
description:
Waverley Communications have been successfully publishing for the UK building market since 1990. Waverley's comprehensive and dynamic portfolio of editorially led magazines provides in depth report and analysis on UK Building, looking at trends in both the public and private sector. Our readers know they can expect a full and detailed picture of the industry and the ways in which investments, policy and environmental concerns impact and shape it. We also inform on the very latest technical applications and innovations, whilst keeping an insightful eye on future developments. 

MMC (Modern Methods of Construction) Magazine, launched in 2005, has followed the rapid rise of offsite and affordable construction.

Other titles by Waverley are HA (Housing Association Magazine) and R&R (Refurb and Renew), School Building and the recently launched Retail Build. These are complimented by product card packs.
